Name: SearchView
Description: SearchView provides observer independent data handling and communication capability using get, post and find calls to a hosted web service and gets typed content objects SearchView extends functionality from ObjectView. SearchView is extract and present only CRUD component, this means its useful when information or data is required for extraction and presentation in textual or grid (tabular) format. SearchView extends from ObjectView and for information about ObjectView visit here.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.clearRecords
InstanceFunctions.Description: Clears(resets) observer records list and view.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.select
InstanceFunctions.Description: Selects records based on provided key(views object key) and keyword(via observer keyword property) and page number.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.selectList
InstanceFunctions.Description: Selects records based on provided key(views object key) and keyword(via observer keyword property) and page number.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.find
InstanceFunctions.Description: Find records based on provided keyword(via observer keyword property) and page number.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.list
InstanceFunctions.Description: Find records based on provided keyword(via observer keyword property) and page number.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.findRequest
InstanceFunctions.Description: Find records based on provided keyword(via observer keyword property) and page number.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.listRequest
InstanceFunctions.Description: List records based on provided keyword(via observer keyword property) and page number.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.presentErrors
InstanceFunctions.Description: Error processing and presenting event subscription.

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.presentRecord

InstanceFunctions.Name: instance.presentRecords
